title: Results from Phase 1 of the NISRA COVID-19 Opinion Survey
publisher: Northern Ireland Statistics and Research Agency
description: Results from phase 1 of the NISRA COVID-19 Opinion Survey. The survey is designed to measure how the COVID-19 pandemic is affecting peoples’ lives and behaviour in Northern Ireland. The results relate to Phase 1 of the survey and are based on interviews carried out with members of the public between 21 April and 22 June 2020.
datasetNotes: On the landing page under documents
sizingNotes: A large number of simple structure tables, with Graphs
notes: This is survey style data, so should wait until we have the policy / model defined for handling this type of data
